backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing access-controlled user profiles, push subscriptions, radio stream checks, and request storage using maps and HTTP outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing feature evidence, affected frontend files, related components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_DEBUG.md: Notes documenting rollback to version 99 and listing reverted features for verification.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA metadata, icons, Google Cast SDK, and root mounting element.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and shortcuts.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing static asset caching, cache cleanup, and network-first navigation handling.
frontend/README-verify.md: Guide explaining how to run the frontend verification script before deployment.
frontend/scripts/verify-frontend.mjs: Node script that verifies TypeScript config, background asset references, service worker setup, and presence of required assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing navigation, audio playback state, stream loading, error handling, and UI components like MiniPlayer and BottomTabNav.
frontend/src/components/CastControl.tsx: Chromecast control button that starts or stops casting and shows status or errors.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Handles PWA installation prompts and device-specific install guides with dismissal logic.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Renders a bottom tab navigation bar with Home, Shows, and Settings tabs, highlighting the active tab and handling tab changes.
frontend/src/components/player/MiniPlaye: Displays a compact audio player with album art, scrolling title, artist info, and a play/pause button, and opens the full player on click.
frontend/src/components/player/TrackTitl: Provides an animated marquee for long track titles with reduced‑motion handling and pause/resume interactions.
frontend/src/components/player/VolumeSli: Implements a volume slider synced with an audio element, updating both UI state and audio volume.
frontend/src/components/PushNotification: Panel for enabling and displaying push notification subscription status and errors.
frontend/src/components/RequestForm.tsx: Dialog form for submitting song or shoutout requests with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/ServiceWorkerRec: Banner prompting users to refresh or reset when service worker updates or app load errors occur.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: Share button using Web Share API with a fallback modal for copying the app link.
frontend/src/components/shows/ShowCard.t: Shows a card for a radio show with image, description, genres, and schedule, triggering a callback on click.
frontend/src/components/status/LiveBadge: Renders a red animated LIVE badge with a ping effect and radio icon.
frontend/src/components/status/OnAirIndi: Displays a small animated pulsing dot indicating on‑air status.
frontend/src/components/TrackNotificatio: Floating notification showing current track, mix, or live show with styling based on type.
frontend/src/data/mockShows.ts: Defines the Show interface and provides mock show data including titles, descriptions, schedules, genres, and images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on user identity, reinitializing and invalidating related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAlbumArtBackground: Empty hook file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppLifecyclePlayba: Handles restoring audio playback when the page becomes visible, returns from bfcache, or regains focus, requesting manual resume if needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundImageDia: Logs diagnostic info about whether the body's background image loaded correctly, warning if missing.
frontend/src/hooks/useChromecast.tsx: Manages Chromecast API initialization, session handling, and casting state for a stream URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useElementCallbackRef: Provides a stable callback ref that tracks and returns the current DOM element.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavoriteStation.ts: Tracks and toggles a favorite station flag using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context handling initialization, login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useKeyboardFocusInten: Detects recent keyboard navigation to distinguish keyboard-driven focus from pointer interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarqueeMeasurement: Measures container/text widths to determine overflow and compute marquee animation properties.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Manages metadata-based notification triggers, deduplication, and browser permission handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePushSubscription.t: Handles browser push subscription workflow including permission, service worker registration, and backend storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching stream URLs with fallback logic, checking stream availability, retrieving now playing data, and submitting requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerRegis: Manages service worker registration, update checks, reset operations, and exposes update control state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSleepTimer.ts: Implements a countdown sleep timer that pauses an audio element when time expires.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Handles requesting and releasing screen wake locks during active playback with visibility-based re-requesting.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, global layout styles, background behavior, safe-area handling, and marquee animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, configuring React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/screens/BrowseShowsScreen.t: Displays a browsable list of shows with genre and day filters and notifies parent when a show is selected.
frontend/src/screens/HomeLiveScreen.tsx: Live stream home UI showing station info, playback controls, and error/connection states.
frontend/src/screens/NowPlayingScreen.ts: Displays now-playing details with album art, playback controls, volume, and sleep timer support.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsAboutScreen: Settings page for notifications and refreshing cached background images with service worker integration.
frontend/src/screens/ShowDetailScreen.ts: Show detail view rendering schedule, genres, description, and allowing calendar export.
Startup diagnostics utility capturing early load errors and optionally showing a recovery overlay.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Utility functions for safe Google Analytics event tracking including play, pause, and cast events.
frontend/src/utils/ics.ts: Generates an ICS calendar file for a show by computing the next occurrence and formatting event metadata before triggering a file download.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeArtworkUrl.t: Validates and normalizes artwork URLs, converting relative or protocol-relative paths to absolute HTTPS URLs or returning null if invalid.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, screens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including features, requests, metadata, and current versioning information.
